timeline.message:
Bump antlr4 to 4.7.1

A security fix is included in this version. See https://github.com/antlr/antlr4/issues/2069.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    <antlr.version>4.7.1</antlr.version>
          
          
            
                    <antlr.version>4.7.2</antlr.version>
          
      
    
    
  

The latest 4.7.x version is 4.7.2 -> https://search.maven.org/artifact/org.antlr/antlr4-runtime
timeline.author: adangel
